chart_description: This chart tracks the input/output rate of table indexes in bytes per second. It helps to identify disk or memory constraints affecting database performance.

dimension_descriptions.disk: This dimension represents the disk usage of the table index input/output. Disk performance is often a bottleneck for database performance.
dimension_descriptions.memory: This dimension represents the memory usage of the table index input/output. High memory usage can also negatively impact database performance.
